name: NetzHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A skill to control your NetzHome Wi-Fi Socket.
This skill can control the "NetzHome" Security Sensors through Alexa commands.
 
 
This skill requires: 
A NetzHome account created using the mobile app. You can download the "NetzHome" app from "Google Play (Android)" or "App Store (IOS)".
NetzHome Hardware such as Wi-Socket or security sensor.
Detailed instructions: 
1. Login to the skill with your "NetzHome" Account.
2. In the Alexa app select "Discover Devices". (Make sure that you have devices synced with your "NetzHome" Account) 
3. Command devices via Alexa API like "Turn on (device)" , "Turn off (device)" , “Dim (device)” , “Brighten (device)” , “Set (device) to (Color name)” , “Set (device) to {#} percent”.
